description: This file implements basic obfuscation and unobfuscation functions in C, providing placeholders for data masking operations that involve a passphrase and randomization. It includes licensing and author information, and currently has incomplete implementations.

methods.name: char * obfuscate(const char * passphrase,uint32_t passLen,const char * input,uint32_t inputLen,uint32_t * outputLen)
methods.description: Encrypts or obfuscates input data into a buffer using a passphrase, currently a placeholder that simply copies input data.

methods.name: char * unobfuscate(const char * passphrase,uint32_t passLen,const char * input,uint32_t inputLen,uint32_t * outputLen)
methods.description: De-obfuscates data from a buffer using a passphrase, currently a placeholder that simply copies input data.

ctags.name: obfuscate
ctags.signature: (const char * passphrase,uint32_t passLen,const char * input,uint32_t inputLen,uint32_t * outputLen)

ctags.name: unobfuscate
ctags.signature: (const char * passphrase,uint32_t passLen,const char * input,uint32_t inputLen,uint32_t * outputLen)
